title: Topic 001 Question 215
body: A company’s AWS Lambda function is experiencing performance issues. The Lambda function performs many CPU-intensive operations. The Lambda function is not running fast enough and is creating bottlenecks in the system.
What should a SysOps administrator do to resolve this issue?
options: In the CPU launch options for the Lambda function, activate hyperthreading.
Turn off the AWS managed encryption.
Increase the amount of memory for the Lambda function.
Load the required code into a custom layer.
